Tanks

类 Tank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Tank

  • public class Tank
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a tank in the game.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Tank

        public Tank(java.lang.String name,
            int x,
            int y,
            int r,
            int g,
            int b)
        Constructs a new Tank object.
        参数:
        name - the name of the player controlling the tank
        x - the x-coordinate of the tank's position
        y - the y-coordinate of the tank's position
        r - the red component of the tank's color
        g - the green component of the tank's color
        b - the blue component of the tank's color
